question: The Unified Package Insurance Scheme aims at providing:
option2: financial protection to citizens associated in agriculture sector
option4: credit linked subsidy for first-time home buyers
answer: financial protection to citizens associated in agriculture sector
explanation: Unified Package Insurance Scheme aims at providing financial protection to citizens associated in agriculture sector, thereby ensuring food security, crop diversification and enhancing growth and competitiveness of agriculture sector besides protecting farmers from financial risks. The cover will be for one full year except for Crop Insurance (which will be bi-annual separately for Kharif and Rabi seasons) renewable from year to year.
